text.text: The game focuses on an amnesiac protagonist who awakens in a cave. Through his

text.name: info8
text.text: explorations, he discovers a plot by the Doctor, a megalomaniac who intends to force

text.name: info9
text.text: the inhabitants of the cave to fight for him in his bid to conquer the world. The

text.name: info10
text.text: protagonist is thrust into the position of savior as he endeavors to defeat the Doctor.
